response: Well, you know, there was this one time. I was just having a normal conversation with someone. I didn't even realize I was getting defensive. response: Well, you know, I've always been a bit of a procrastinator. I used to think that I could just wing it and it would all work out. But then, I realized that I was always putting things off until the last minute. It was really stressful. For example, when I had to write a big report for work, I kept putting it off. I'd keep thinking, "I'll do it tomorrow." But then tomorrow came and I still hadn't started. It was only when I finally sat down and just started writing that I was able to finish it. It was a wake-up call for me. I learned that being prepared and getting things done on time is really important. So, what about you? Have you ever had a similar experience?
